name: MinePuzzle
description:
A little bit of a rushed game! Please tell me if you encounter any bugs

Your goal?

Try and finish all the levels in the lowest amount of tries, you'll see it's not that easy

Try and finish a puzzle in the lowest amount of time possible

Try and complete the highest number of tiles available with the custom grid\

Things I will add: Highscores(time and tries) + stopping the music
